subject: Tonight--- Paranormal Sibs Radio Show at 10pm est
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Tonight on Paranormal Sibs Radio , our guest will be Chris Felton, an
engineer and maker of the newest and latest Ghost box.. He will discuss what he
does and how the new additions to the new box will help to advance the research
in RTSC, Real Time Spirit Communication

http://stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html
